sentences.en: A product manager is responsible for product profitability.
sentences.cn: 产品经理对产品的盈利状况负责.

sentences.en: Changes were made in operating methods in an effort to increase profitability.
sentences.cn: 为了提高利润，经营方式上发生了改变。

sentences.en: How to move from stable administration to volatile enterprise profitability?
sentences.cn: 如何从按部就班转变到随机应变,创造利润?

sentences.en: If Yantan after injection of assets, the company significantly improve profitability.
sentences.cn: 如果岩滩资产注入后, 公司盈利能力大为提高.

sentences.en: It gives me an opportunity to declare my own belief in profitability.
sentences.cn: 我有机会对于赢利可能性问题谈谈自己的看法.

sentences.en: It helps them to measure the profitability of products, establish break - even points and so on.
sentences.cn: 还帮助他们估量产品的盈利能力, 定出持平点等等.

sentences.en: Low levels of profitability mean there is a lack of incentive to undertake new investment.
sentences.cn: 利润率低意味着缺乏新投资的动力.

sentences.en: Modernizing a business to increase its profitability and competitiveness is a complicated affair.
sentences.cn: 使企业现代化,从而达到增加利润,增强竞争力的目的,是一件复杂的事情.

sentences.en: No, I don't agree. I think we should go for higher profitability.
sentences.cn: 不, 我不同意. 我想我们应该追求更高的可得利润率.

sentences.en: Pilferage in the warehouse reduces profitability by about two per cent.
sentences.cn: 仓库中的失窃使利润损失了百分之二.

sentences.en: Safety, liquidity, profitability of commercial banks has always been a goal.
sentences.cn: 安全性 、 流动性 、 盈利性历来是商业银行的经营目标.

sentences.en: Subject every proposal to one test -- profitability.
sentences.cn: 每一项建议都必须经受这一条检验 - -有利可图.

sentences.en: The managing director is interested only in increasing profitability.
sentences.cn: 总经理仅对提高利润率感兴趣.

sentences.en: These costs will impact on our profitability.
sentences.cn: 这些费用会影响到我们的利润.

sentences.en: What management practices you would adopt to enhance profitability and harmony?
sentences.cn: 您将采取什么样的管理方式来提高盈利率和企业的和谐性?

words.tran_cn: 有利可图的；赚钱的；有益的
赢利能力；收益性；利益率

phrases.tran_cn: 获利能力分析；盈利分析

trans.tran_cn: 获利（状况），盈利（情况），[经]收益性，利益率，有利
